description: Two stacked leaves, two inverted caret legs on each leaf, and wings pointing away from each other on each leaf

features.description: What is the decoration in each leaf? 0 = none, 1 = hatching, 2 = dot
What side do the caret legs appear on? 0 = left, 1 = right
What shape is each wings? 0 = two curved lines, 1 = horn shaped, 2 = connected horns (wings connected to each other)
